text: Maria Belen Perez Sanchez (born January 5, 1973 in Granada) is a cyclist from Spain. She has a disability: She is blind. She competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. She finished second in the Tandem Road Race. She finished third in the Tandem Individual Pursuit track race. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from Granada
title: María Belén Perez Sanchez
